_meta.description: SMS notification sent to teacher confirming payout
_meta.assumption: SMS template for payout success notification

value.message: Congratulations! Rs.500 has been credited to your UPI ID (9876543210@upi) for stray dog report (Tracking ID: ABC12345). UTR: 423456789012. Thank you for helping make our community safer!

payoutComplete._comment: End of happy path - teacher has received payment
